data.name: AEGIS Kingdoms
data.detailed_description:
Begin your new life and travel to the mysterious continent of Ophelia. Adventure through these new lands to discover its secrets. Fulfil commissions, grow crops, raise animals, delve into dungeons and much more!

The Grand Empire has lifted its military restriction on the new land and are now actively supporting the relocation of civilians to make a home for themselves in Ophelia. Arrivals find themselves in New Camelot, the first settlement on Ophelia. There is much to be done, and a number of factions are dedicated to providing support for New Camelots inhabitants, providing steady work for those willing and able.

The Relic Hunters

Discovering the secrets of the past will help the prosperity and future of New Camelot, and The Grand Empire. Delve into ancient ruins and procure artefacts and relics to unfold the mysteries of Ophelia's former inhabitants. Just be sure to avoid any traps they may have left behind.

The Adventurer's Guild

Calling all cartographers, adventurers, climbers and explorers! This new land needs you to trail blaze across the land in search of exciting adventures. Plant your flag at the tallest mountain, map all of the surrounding areas and explore the secrets of Ophelia.

The Mercenary Legion

Whilst there are guards inside New Camelot, the rest of the world lays open and waiting for danger. Get paid for beating up bad guys, hacking and slashing through enemies and anything else you’re willing to do for gold.

The Engineer's Society

Scientists, tinkers, engineers and anyone interested in understanding the working parts of a machine! You’re needed to understand this vast new place. Collect samples of fauna and flora, create wonderful and weird contraptions to generate power and tinker with whatever else you can get your hands on.

The Settler's Union

There’s a lot to be done in a new settlement. As a builder and craftsman, you’ll be gathering resources and crafting all sorts of things for the residence of New Camelot. You’ll even learn how to farm, raise animals and contribute greatly to society as a Settler.

ABOUT

  • AEGIS Kingdoms is a shared world life-sim RPG with horizontal combat progression, and provides a place where you can enjoy being part of a fun community.
  • The various gameplay aspects are split into those factions above, as well as being able to do story based quests called “Adventures”.
  • Cosmetic orientated rewards
  • Absolutely no pay to win. Cash shop items are cosmetic and to support development.
  • Vertical progression for trade craft skills influenced by old-school RPG games that you know and love.
  • Encouragement to explore the open world with lots of hidden gems and fun.
  • ...And lots more coming soon!

data.short_description: AEGIS Kingdoms is an online life-sim RPG. Seek daring adventures in the scenic Sky Island continent of Ophelia alongside companions. Fulfil commissions, grow crops, raise animals, join friends delving into dungeons or explore the open online world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Distro updated to at least 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4350 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 / Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
